text: A Romance of Wastdale is a 1921 British silent adventure movie directed by Maurice Elvey and was based on the 1895 novel of the same name by A. E. W. Mason. It stars Milton Rosmer, Fred Raynham, Irene Rooke. ==Other websites== * Category:1921 movies Category:1920s adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Maurice Elvey Category:Movies set in France
title: A Romance of Wastdale
